issue.title: [Doc][Python] Add a recipe on how to save partitioned datasets to the Cookbook
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13675](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13675). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We show how to read paritioned data, but we don't show how to write it in the Cookbook

comments.body:
